channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: General detritus and leaves in underpass, 16th November
item.description:
The underpass under the A40 has a substantial amount of leaves, mud from recent heavy rain, and other detritus. This has built up over the past few weeks and is apparent on the slopes and stairs both sides on the A40, and in the underpass itself. This is a slip hazard to pedestrians and cyclists using the underpass. Please could it be thoroughly cleaned?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The manhole covers on the large ‘speed bump’ are very wobbly and make a loud noise every time a vehicle goes over it. Keeping my toddler awake at bedtime., 16th November
item.description:
On the large raised speed bump on the ‘cross road’ of Sunrise Avenue/Huntlowe Close/Washpool Road. Has got steadily worse over the last few months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Washpool Road, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: 4 bags of rubble/hardcore left after work carried out to install electric car charging, 16th November
item.description:
Car park adj property centre estate agents. Reported a couple of times to council and highways but MONTHS later the bags are still there. Council said car park belongs to pub. Rang landlord and he said no, car park belongs to council

item.title: Damaged road surface causing house vibrations and internal house damage from traffic, 15th November
item.description:
Near the bus stop on Gloucester Road (near to house numbers 187 and 185 Gloucester Road), the road is in a very poor state of repair. Heavy traffic travelling along the road on the surface causes our house to seriously vibrate. We have had pictures and mirrors fall off walls, doors shake and damage internally.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 211, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
